name: string-reverse-wasm
description: Simple codebase for reversing a string via WebAssembly with jco

scripts.build: jco componentize string-reverse.mjs --wit wit/component.wit --world-name component --out string-reverse.wasm --disable all
scripts.transpile: jco transpile string-reverse.wasm -o dist/transpiled && mv dist/transpiled/string-reverse.js dist/transpiled/string-reverse.mjs
